cast.name: 彼得·查赫尼埃基 Piotr Czarniecki

introduction: A film from the border. Straddling the border of genres, somewhere between comedy and drama, realism and nightmare. And also asking about boundaries. Boundaries between; health and illness, help and violence, undergoing treatment and life's passivity and helpless sinking into whatever fate brings. It is also a story about femininity. Femininity in illness. Social expectations towards women and sick people. About sinking into a sick world and trying to emerge from it, and finally about accepting your difficult experiences, which gives you a chance to move on. You can't escape from difficult, traumatic experiences, you can't deny them. If we don't accept them, sooner or later they will come back.
